response.original_title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
response.overview: Instead of flying to Florida with his folks, Kevin ends up alone in New York, where he gets a hotel room with his dad's credit card—despite problems from a clerk and meddling bellboy. But when Kevin runs into his old nemeses, the Wet Bandits, he's determined to foil their plans to rob a toy store on Christmas Eve.
response.tagline: He's up past his bedtime in the city that never sleeps.
response.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
